snippet.title: Bloodroots Platforms Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Get it on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/820540?utm_source=yt_Z1bCllYcY3I

In Bloodroots, the world is your weapon - improvise and adapt to an ever-changing ballet of ultraviolence, in a bloody revenge quest across the Weird West. Coming to Nintendo Switch, PlayStation 4 and PC this summer!

http://bloodrootsgame.com
http://discord.gg/bloodroots
http://fb.com/papercultgames
http://twitter.com/papercultgames
